activities:
The Motley Fool, LLC's collection and processing of information from users within the EU and Switzerland varies according to the products or services requested by the consumer.  The Motley Fool may collect personal information to permit registration, to fulfill requests for products, programs and services, to personalize those products, programs and services, to direct market to consumers products/services that may be of interest to them, to analyze data to improve its products and services and to use this information as otherwise required or permitted by law.  

The Motley Fool also collects and processses certain information about the current and past employees of its UK and German subsidiaries.  Such information includes compensation information (base salary, insurance and equity grants), employment agreements and offer letters.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: European Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner.
